nodes.text: A base built into an asteroid served as the hideout of the Hidden Hand criminal syndicate and its leader, Gwi. Originally one of many hidden outposts constructed within asteroid fields by the bounty hunter Cavic, the base was discovered and repurposed by the Hidden Hand. After being hired for an unsuccessful hunt for Darth Vader by the Hidden Hand, the bounty hunter Beilert Valance led the Empire to the base, and the Hidden Hand was destroyed.
